Omiscid-1.5.1.tgzThe C++ implementation of containing the necessary files and instruction about how to build the library.
1.5.1 (Debian package using mDNS)debomiscid-mdns_1.5.1_i386.deb
omiscid-mdns-debug_1.5.1_i386.debA Debian package to install using mDNS (as there is no Debian package for MDNS from Apple, you will need to install it manually before using OMiSCID). mDNS seems to be more stable than Avahi, you may choose this package. There are 2 versions: standard and debug (with more traces and symbols).
1.5.1 (Debian package using Avahi)debomiscid-avahi_1.5.1_i386.deb
omiscid-avahi-debug_1.5.1_i386.debA Debian package to install using Avahi. There are 2 versions: standard and debug (with more traces and symbols).
1.5.1 (Debian dev package)debomiscid-dev_1.5.1_i386.debA Debian to install the files needed by developpers. One of the previous packages must be installed before this one.
Java Library (Java 5.0)1.5.1zipomiscid-java-library-1.5.1.zipThe java implementation of containing basic classes (it also contains the old gui).
OSGi1.5.0jarjomiscid-bundle-1.5.0.jarAn OSGi interface to , requires Felix, iPOJO and Java 6.0.
